name: The Light (itch) (Trian)
description:
Explore your way through a dark and treacherous dungeon filled with monsters, with nothing but a lantern to guide you. Duck and dodge your way through the corridors of death to find your way out.

Made by my brother and myself for the 72 hours jam. We're both new to unity so we're pretty happy with the outcome even though it was down to the wire.
